title: kuTrattaiyE
sahitya:
kuTrattaiyE pArttAr-shuTramillai enru kUri vA nal manamE


anupallavi

  ciTrarivinAl enadu kaTrarivinAl ulagap-paTrarivinAl anda muTrarivan nOgha shei


caraNam    azhagillai guNamillai aNiyillai paNamillai Ayiram kuraiyuDaiya shEizhaiyAyEnum
pazhagiya nan maNavALan parivumillai enil indap-pAzh uDalil enakkenna vAzhkkai paripUraNan
